summary: These are simple PDF\'s that can help you under stand the Skill\'s of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
These are simple PDF\'s that can help you under stand the Skill\'s of Skyrim and I have all the ID\'s so you may add a Perk.

How this works find the skill you want to add EX: Novice Alteration. Hit \" ~ \" type in 
\" player.addperk f2ca6 \" This will add Novice Alteration as a learned perk without using a perk point.

WARNING: Us at your own risk, it is know to cause problems if you add a perk that has multiple ranks, such as Mage Armor. Save your real Perk Point to use on perks that have multiple levels.

Thank You!
I wish I would have uploaded this a long time ago I original made this back in the first week of Skyrim, but used just for me and friends.

========================================================================
Check out my other mod at [URL=file.php?id=7636]Fav Menu - Custom Favorites Menu Redone[/URL]
========================================================================

If you find any error\'s please send me a pm
author: Delta6326
